DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine Progressive Heavy Load Exercises ( PHLE ) treatment patient diagnose Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy superior `` Standard Low-Load Exercises '' ( LLE ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The trial perform multicenter randomise control trail , include 110 patient diagnosed Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy four orthopaedic shoulder clinic secondary sector Denmark . The PHLE intervention consist progressive strengthening exercise perform heavy load dumbbell , target rotator cuff 12 week home-exercise program six control visit physiotherapy department hospital . The LLE exercise program consist exercise PHLE , perform low load dumbbell . `` Disability Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire '' use primary outcome measure 12 week post baseline . 12 month post baseline secondary follow-up perform primarily measure number patient referred operation . Patients randomise either PHLE LLE regime block accord whether refer corticosteroid injection orthopaedic shoulder specialist . *April 2015 : ( We originally expect able include 260 patient order analyze data accord sub-groups exercise group +/- Corticosteroid injection , inclusion rate much low expect , due time restraint expect include 110 patient ) Primary investigator patient blind towards group assignment .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 65 year age history shoulder complaint last least 3 month prior enrolment Pain locate proximal lateral aspect upper arm ( C5 dermatome ) aggravate abduction Positive `` Full Can test '' AND/OR `` Jobes test/Empty Can test '' AND/OR `` Resisted External Rotation test '' Positive `` HawkinsKennedy test AND/OR Neers test Ultrasonographic verification tendon swelling , hypo echoic area , fibrillar disruption neovascularization RC . Resting pain 40 mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) ; Bilateral shoulder pain Less 90 degree active elevation arm ; Full thickness RC rupture verify ultrasonography ; Corticosteroid injection within last 6 week ; Radiologic verify fracture , calcification large 5 mm ( vertical distance ) RC tendon , glenohumeral arthrosis malalignment shoulder complex ; Prior surgery dislocation affect shoulder ; Clinically suspect labrum lesion , arthritis ACjoint , frozen shoulder symptom derive cervical spine ; Sensory motor deficit neck arm ; Suspected compete diagnosis ( e.g. , Rheumatoid arthritis , Cancer , Neurological disorder , Fibromyalgia , Schizophrenia , Suicidal threaten , Borderline personality disorder , Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ) ; Pregnancy ; Inability fluently understand write spoken Danish .
